scripts.watch: sudo git pull && sudo nodemon --delay 10 src/app.js
scripts.build-and-deploy: npm run pull-from-git && npm run build
scripts.deploy: uglifyjs src/js/websitejs.js -o dist/js/websitejs.js && uglifyjs src/js/violinHero.js -o dist/js/violinHero.js  && uglifyjs src/js/note.js -o dist/js/note.js && uglifyjs src/js/pitchdetect2.js -o dist/js/pitchdetect2.js&& cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -a src/images/. dist/images/ && cp -a src/css/. dist/css/ && cp -a src/pages/. dist/ && cp -a src/js/. dist/js/ && git add -A && git commit -m "adds dist" && git push
scripts.local: uglifyjs src/js/websitejs.js -o dist/js/websitejs.js && uglifyjs src/js/violinHero.js -o dist/js/violinHero.js  && uglifyjs src/js/note.js -o dist/js/note.js && uglifyjs src/js/pitchdetect2.js -o dist/js/pitchdetect2.js&& cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -a src/images/. dist/images/ && cp -a src/css/. dist/css/ && cp -a src/pages/. dist/ && cp -a src/js/. dist/js/ && node src/app.js
